name: Snow Bros. 2 Special
summary: Snow Bros. 2 Special is a remake of the 1994 arcade game Snow Bros. 2 by ToaPlan. It features new graphics, new stages, new game modes such as Time Attack, Survival, and Sky Run, and supports local and online multiplayer for up to four players. Players can also enjoy the original version of Snow Bros. 2, as the original score was one of the most popular requests from players.
